title: How Democrats Defied the Odds
description: In the midterms, the party bucked decades of conventional political wisdom, while the Republican playbook largely failed.
dc:creator: Michael Barbaro, Stella Tan, Jessica Cheung, Asthaa Chaturvedi, M.J. Davis Lin, Marion Lozano, Rowan Niemisto and Chris Wood
